DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomized safety efficacy trial adult , treatment-naïve Chronic Hepatitis C ( CHC ) participant genotype 1 infection . The study conduct 2 part , compare standard-of-care PegIntron ( 1.5 μg/kg , weekly [ QW ] ) , plus ribavirin ( 800 1400 mg/day ) , 48 week five treatment paradigm contain boceprevir ( SCH 503034 ) 800 mg thrice day ( TID ) . The five treatment include boceprevir ( BOC ) plus standard-of-care 28 48 week , without 4-week lead-in PegIntron ( PEG ) ribavirin ( RBV ) , exploration PegIntron plus low-dose ribavirin ( 400 1000 mg/day ) plus boceprevir 48 week .
